# Polymorph, Adaptive (Spell)
## Overview
[[Transmutation Spells|Transmutation]]

**Level:** [[6th Level Druid Spells|Druid 6]], [[6th Level Sorcerer Spells|Sorcerer 6]], [[6th Level Wizard Spells|Wizard 6]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 12th-Level Druid Spells List|Druid 12]], [[BoXM 12th-Level Wizard Spells List|Wizard 12]]

**Casting Time:** 1 standard action

**Components:** V, S, M

**Range:** Touch

**Target:** Willing living creature touched

**Duration:** 24 hours (D)

**Saving Throw:** None

**Spell Resistance:** No

**Source:** The Mage's Tower 

This spell increases the power and efficiency of any transmutation or polymorph spell or effect so that when it subsumes any magical equipment (as part of the shapeshift) that equipment's magical effects (ie., armor bonus, ability enhancement, etc.) remain in effect on the wearer.
